You and Rah want to figure out what is going on. You two decide to follow them to the market. You and Rah follow the two workers to a strange looking market stall. The smell of a savory soup and something sweet reach your nostrils from the stand. Beyond the stand's table, a large purple curtain conceals the source of the smells.

The two workers from the docks walk around the stall's desk, and behind the curtains of the market stand. You and Rah wait, continuing to watch the stall attentively. Then a man dressed in an odd purple suit emerges from the curtain, smiling in an uncomfortably welcoming way. The purple suited man looks around, seemingly for customers to the stand. It appears they are trying to sell food. You think.

Go back to the boatOrder some food from the stand
